definition: variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
so I have heard (idiom)/the beginning clause of Buddha's quotations as recorded by his disciple, Ananda (Buddhism)

sentences.english: Shariputra, the Land of Utmost Happiness is crowned in merits, virtues and splendors such as these.
sentences.chinese: 舍利弗，极乐国土，成就如是功德庄严。

sentences.english: So said Barack Obama at the start of this week.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马总统本周刚刚开始时如是表示。

sentences.english: We all have elections, they said.
sentences.chinese: 我们都赢得了选举，他们如是说。

sentences.english: It is the theme of this book.
The case of a blood clot, or amenorrhea, pills mill liquor service is available.
sentences.chinese: 如是血块或闭经可用丸药磨酒服。

sentences.english: Their number incalculable; Thus also is the assembly of Bodhisattvas.
sentences.chinese: 非是算数之所能知，诸菩萨众，亦复如是。

sentences.english: The merits, virtues and adornments such as these are inconceivable.
sentences.chinese: 如是功德庄严，不可思议。

sentences.english: And after this had happened several times, people stopped employing him as a copyist.
sentences.chinese: 如是几次，叫他钞书的人也没有了。

sentences.english: “Without them, we couldn’t hold our own in the Bundesliga,” says Mr Rangnick.
sentences.chinese: “没有他们，我们的德甲就没法继续”兰尼克如是说。

sentences.english: But the feeling that what is now is real has never changed, even in dream.
sentences.chinese: 但即使梦中，那当下如是的感觉从来不变。

sentences.english: The original pain is life journey, lost can also form.
sentences.chinese: 原来痛苦是人生必经之旅，失去也可以作如是观。

sentences.english: Time is a gentle deity, said Sophocles.
sentences.chinese: 时间之神温雅从容，索福克勒斯如是说。

sentences.english: Female applicant pregnant if yes date of L. M. P.
sentences.chinese: 女申请者是否怀孕？如是，注明最后月经日期。

sentences.english: They are not satisfied with their current knowledge and entertainment," said Sheng.
sentences.chinese: 他们并不满足于现有的知识和娱乐，”盛邦和如是说。

sentences.english: “This is a whole new ballgame for us, ” Mr. Shepard said.
sentences.chinese: 对美国来说这是一个全新的比赛，邓沙博先生如是说。

definition: none doesn't/there is none who isn't/everyone
